data.title: David Robbins
data.meta_description: David’s first career was as a recording engineer in the music industry in New York City, where he worked with prominent artists such as Madonna and David Byrne…
data.text: David’s first career was as a recording engineer in the music industry in New York City, where he worked with prominent artists such as Madonna and David Byrne when he wasn’t traveling to the Napa Valley to appease his wine obsession. David and his wife Letitia finally gave into the call of wine and moved to the Napa Valley in 1999. A certified Level II Sommelier, David has headed up hospitality and sales for top Napa producers including Darioush, Hartwell Vineyards, and D. R. Stephens Estate.
